abstract: The app, which is expected to be released in the coming weeks, reveals a different, experimental take on Facebook’s long-established approach to identity.
snippet: The app, which is expected to be released in the coming weeks, reveals a different, experimental take on Facebook’s long-established approach to identity.
lead_paragraph: Facebook has long attempted to be the place where, above all else, you try to be yourself.

headline.main: Facebook Developing App That Allows Anonymity
